titles: A funerall elegye in memory of the late vertuous Maister VVilliam Peter of Whipton neere Excester. By W.S.
Funerall elegye in memory of the late vertuous Maister William Peter of Whipton neere Excester
author: W. S., fl. 1612.
Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616, attributed name.
notes: Sometimes attributed to William Shakespeare; cf. "A sleuth gets his man: it's Shakespeare", New York Times, Jan. 14, 1996.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Peter, William, 1582-1612 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
